title: AWS Greengrass
description: AWS IoT Greengrass seamlessly extends AWS onto physical devices so they can act locally on the data they generate, while still using the cloud for management, analytics, and durable storage. AWS IoT Greengrass ensures your devices can respond quickly to local events and operate with intermittent connectivity. AWS IoT Greengrass minimizes the cost of transmitting data to the cloud by allowing you to author AWS Lambda functions that execute locally.

ListBulkDeployments.title: Returns a list of bulk deployments.
ListBulkDeployments.description: Returns a list of bulk deployments.

StartBulkDeployment.title: Deploys multiple groups in one operation. This action starts the bulk deployment of a specified set of group versions. Each group version deployment will be triggered with an adaptive rate that has a fixed upper limit. We recommend that you include an ''X-Amzn-Client-Token'' token in every ''StartBulkDeployment'' request. These requests are idempotent with respect to the token and the request parameters.
StartBulkDeployment.description: Deploys multiple groups in one operation. This action starts the bulk deployment of a specified set of group versions. Each group version deployment will be triggered with an adaptive rate that has a fixed upper limit. We recommend that you include an ''X-Amzn-Client-Token'' token in every ''StartBulkDeployment'' request. These requests are idempotent with respect to the token and the request parameters.

StopBulkDeployment.title: Stops the execution of a bulk deployment. This action returns a status of ''Stopping'' until the deployment is stopped. You cannot start a new bulk deployment while a previous deployment is in the ''Stopping'' state. This action doesn't rollback completed deployments or cancel pending deployments.
StopBulkDeployment.description: Stops the execution of a bulk deployment. This action returns a status of ''Stopping'' until the deployment is stopped. You cannot start a new bulk deployment while a previous deployment is in the ''Stopping'' state. This action doesn't rollback completed deployments or cancel pending deployments.

ListBulkDeploymentDetailedReports.title: Gets a paginated list of the deployments that have been started in a bulk deployment operation, and their current deployment status.
ListBulkDeploymentDetailedReports.description: Gets a paginated list of the deployments that have been started in a bulk deployment operation, and their current deployment status.

GetBulkDeploymentStatus.title: Returns the status of a bulk deployment.
GetBulkDeploymentStatus.description: Returns the status of a bulk deployment.

ListConnectorDefinitions.title: Retrieves a list of connector definitions.
ListConnectorDefinitions.description: Retrieves a list of connector definitions.

CreateConnectorDefinition.title: Creates a connector definition. You may provide the initial version of the connector definition now or use ''CreateConnectorDefinitionVersion'' at a later time.
CreateConnectorDefinition.description: Creates a connector definition. You may provide the initial version of the connector definition now or use ''CreateConnectorDefinitionVersion'' at a later time.

GetConnectorDefinition.title: Retrieves information about a connector definition.
GetConnectorDefinition.description: Retrieves information about a connector definition.

ListConnectorDefinitionVersions.title: Lists the versions of a connector definition, which are containers for connectors. Connectors run on the Greengrass core and contain built-in integration with local infrastructure, device protocols, AWS, and other cloud services.
ListConnectorDefinitionVersions.description: Lists the versions of a connector definition, which are containers for connectors. Connectors run on the Greengrass core and contain built-in integration with local infrastructure, device protocols, AWS, and other cloud services.

CreateConnectorDefinitionVersion.title: Creates a version of a connector definition which has already been defined.
CreateConnectorDefinitionVersion.description: Creates a version of a connector definition which has already been defined.

GetConnectorDefinitionVersion.title: Retrieves information about a connector definition version, including the connectors that the version contains. Connectors are prebuilt modules that interact with local infrastructure, device protocols, AWS, and other cloud services.
GetConnectorDefinitionVersion.description: Retrieves information about a connector definition version, including the connectors that the version contains. Connectors are prebuilt modules that interact with local infrastructure, device protocols, AWS, and other cloud services.

ListCoreDefinitions.title: Retrieves a list of core definitions.
ListCoreDefinitions.description: Retrieves a list of core definitions.

CreateCoreDefinition.title: Creates a core definition. You may provide the initial version of the core definition now or use ''CreateCoreDefinitionVersion'' at a later time. Greengrass groups must each contain exactly one Greengrass core.
CreateCoreDefinition.description: Creates a core definition. You may provide the initial version of the core definition now or use ''CreateCoreDefinitionVersion'' at a later time. Greengrass groups must each contain exactly one Greengrass core.

GetCoreDefinition.title: Retrieves information about a core definition version.
GetCoreDefinition.description: Retrieves information about a core definition version.

ListCoreDefinitionVersions.title: Lists the versions of a core definition.
ListCoreDefinitionVersions.description: Lists the versions of a core definition.

CreateCoreDefinitionVersion.title: Creates a version of a core definition that has already been defined. Greengrass groups must each contain exactly one Greengrass core.
CreateCoreDefinitionVersion.description: Creates a version of a core definition that has already been defined. Greengrass groups must each contain exactly one Greengrass core.

GetCoreDefinitionVersion.title: Retrieves information about a core definition version.
GetCoreDefinitionVersion.description: Retrieves information about a core definition version.

ListDeviceDefinitions.title: Retrieves a list of device definitions.
ListDeviceDefinitions.description: Retrieves a list of device definitions.

CreateDeviceDefinition.title: Creates a device definition. You may provide the initial version of the device definition now or use ''CreateDeviceDefinitionVersion'' at a later time.
CreateDeviceDefinition.description: Creates a device definition. You may provide the initial version of the device definition now or use ''CreateDeviceDefinitionVersion'' at a later time.

GetDeviceDefinition.title: Retrieves information about a device definition.
GetDeviceDefinition.description: Retrieves information about a device definition.

ListDeviceDefinitionVersions.title: Lists the versions of a device definition.
ListDeviceDefinitionVersions.description: Lists the versions of a device definition.

CreateDeviceDefinitionVersion.title: Creates a version of a device definition that has already been defined.
CreateDeviceDefinitionVersion.description: Creates a version of a device definition that has already been defined.

GetDeviceDefinitionVersion.title: Retrieves information about a device definition version.
GetDeviceDefinitionVersion.description: Retrieves information about a device definition version.

ListFunctionDefinitions.title: Retrieves a list of Lambda function definitions.
ListFunctionDefinitions.description: Retrieves a list of Lambda function definitions.

CreateFunctionDefinition.title: Creates a Lambda function definition which contains a list of Lambda functions and their configurations to be used in a group. You can create an initial version of the definition by providing a list of Lambda functions and their configurations now, or use ''CreateFunctionDefinitionVersion'' later.
CreateFunctionDefinition.description: Creates a Lambda function definition which contains a list of Lambda functions and their configurations to be used in a group. You can create an initial version of the definition by providing a list of Lambda functions and their configurations now, or use ''CreateFunctionDefinitionVersion'' later.

GetFunctionDefinition.title: Retrieves information about a Lambda function definition, including its creation time and latest version.
GetFunctionDefinition.description: Retrieves information about a Lambda function definition, including its creation time and latest version.

ListFunctionDefinitionVersions.title: Lists the versions of a Lambda function definition.
ListFunctionDefinitionVersions.description: Lists the versions of a Lambda function definition.

CreateFunctionDefinitionVersion.title: Creates a version of a Lambda function definition that has already been defined.
CreateFunctionDefinitionVersion.description: Creates a version of a Lambda function definition that has already been defined.

GetFunctionDefinitionVersion.title: Retrieves information about a Lambda function definition version, including which Lambda functions are included in the version and their configurations.
GetFunctionDefinitionVersion.description: Retrieves information about a Lambda function definition version, including which Lambda functions are included in the version and their configurations.

ListLoggerDefinitions.title: Retrieves a list of logger definitions.
ListLoggerDefinitions.description: Retrieves a list of logger definitions.

CreateLoggerDefinition.title: Creates a logger definition. You may provide the initial version of the logger definition now or use ''CreateLoggerDefinitionVersion'' at a later time.
CreateLoggerDefinition.description: Creates a logger definition. You may provide the initial version of the logger definition now or use ''CreateLoggerDefinitionVersion'' at a later time.

GetLoggerDefinition.title: Retrieves information about a logger definition.
GetLoggerDefinition.description: Retrieves information about a logger definition.

ListLoggerDefinitionVersions.title: Lists the versions of a logger definition.
ListLoggerDefinitionVersions.description: Lists the versions of a logger definition.

CreateLoggerDefinitionVersion.title: Creates a version of a logger definition that has already been defined.
CreateLoggerDefinitionVersion.description: Creates a version of a logger definition that has already been defined.

GetLoggerDefinitionVersion.title: Retrieves information about a logger definition version.
GetLoggerDefinitionVersion.description: Retrieves information about a logger definition version.

ListResourceDefinitions.title: Retrieves a list of resource definitions.
ListResourceDefinitions.description: Retrieves a list of resource definitions.

CreateResourceDefinition.title: Creates a resource definition which contains a list of resources to be used in a group. You can create an initial version of the definition by providing a list of resources now, or use ''CreateResourceDefinitionVersion'' later.
CreateResourceDefinition.description: Creates a resource definition which contains a list of resources to be used in a group. You can create an initial version of the definition by providing a list of resources now, or use ''CreateResourceDefinitionVersion'' later.

GetResourceDefinition.title: Retrieves information about a resource definition, including its creation time and latest version.
GetResourceDefinition.description: Retrieves information about a resource definition, including its creation time and latest version.

ListResourceDefinitionVersions.title: Lists the versions of a resource definition.
ListResourceDefinitionVersions.description: Lists the versions of a resource definition.

CreateResourceDefinitionVersion.title: Creates a version of a resource definition that has already been defined.
CreateResourceDefinitionVersion.description: Creates a version of a resource definition that has already been defined.

GetResourceDefinitionVersion.title: Retrieves information about a resource definition version, including which resources are included in the version.
GetResourceDefinitionVersion.description: Retrieves information about a resource definition version, including which resources are included in the version.

ListSubscriptionDefinitions.title: Retrieves a list of subscription definitions.
ListSubscriptionDefinitions.description: Retrieves a list of subscription definitions.

CreateSubscriptionDefinition.title: Creates a subscription definition. You may provide the initial version of the subscription definition now or use ''CreateSubscriptionDefinitionVersion'' at a later time.
CreateSubscriptionDefinition.description: Creates a subscription definition. You may provide the initial version of the subscription definition now or use ''CreateSubscriptionDefinitionVersion'' at a later time.

GetSubscriptionDefinition.title: Retrieves information about a subscription definition.
GetSubscriptionDefinition.description: Retrieves information about a subscription definition.

ListSubscriptionDefinitionVersions.title: Lists the versions of a subscription definition.
ListSubscriptionDefinitionVersions.description: Lists the versions of a subscription definition.

CreateSubscriptionDefinitionVersion.title: Creates a version of a subscription definition which has already been defined.
CreateSubscriptionDefinitionVersion.description: Creates a version of a subscription definition which has already been defined.

GetSubscriptionDefinitionVersion.title: Retrieves information about a subscription definition version.
GetSubscriptionDefinitionVersion.description: Retrieves information about a subscription definition version.

CreateGroup.title: Creates a group. You may provide the initial version of the group or use ''CreateGroupVersion'' at a later time. Tip: You can use the ''gg_group_setup'' package (https://github.com/awslabs/aws-greengrass-group-setup) as a library or command-line application to create and deploy Greengrass groups.
CreateGroup.description: Creates a group. You may provide the initial version of the group or use ''CreateGroupVersion'' at a later time. Tip: You can use the ''gg_group_setup'' package (https://github.com/awslabs/aws-greengrass-group-setup) as a library or command-line application to create and deploy Greengrass groups.

ListGroupCertificateAuthorities.title: Retrieves the current CAs for a group.
ListGroupCertificateAuthorities.description: Retrieves the current CAs for a group.

CreateGroupCertificateAuthority.title: Creates a CA for the group. If a CA already exists, it will rotate the existing CA.
CreateGroupCertificateAuthority.description: Creates a CA for the group. If a CA already exists, it will rotate the existing CA.

GetGroupCertificateConfiguration.title: Retrieves the current configuration for the CA used by the group.
GetGroupCertificateConfiguration.description: Retrieves the current configuration for the CA used by the group.

UpdateGroupCertificateConfiguration.title: Updates the Certificate expiry time for a group.
UpdateGroupCertificateConfiguration.description: Updates the Certificate expiry time for a group.

GetGroupCertificateAuthority.title: Retreives the CA associated with a group. Returns the public key of the CA.
GetGroupCertificateAuthority.description: Retreives the CA associated with a group. Returns the public key of the CA.

ListDeployments.title: Returns a history of deployments for the group.
ListDeployments.description: Returns a history of deployments for the group.

CreateDeployment.title: Creates a deployment. ''CreateDeployment'' requests are idempotent with respect to the ''X-Amzn-Client-Token'' token and the request parameters.
CreateDeployment.description: Creates a deployment. ''CreateDeployment'' requests are idempotent with respect to the ''X-Amzn-Client-Token'' token and the request parameters.

GetDeploymentStatus.title: Returns the status of a deployment.
GetDeploymentStatus.description: Returns the status of a deployment.

DisassociateRoleFromGroup.title: Disassociates the role from a group.
DisassociateRoleFromGroup.description: Disassociates the role from a group.

GetAssociatedRole.title: Retrieves the role associated with a particular group.
GetAssociatedRole.description: Retrieves the role associated with a particular group.

AssociateRoleToGroup.title: Associates a role with a group. Your Greengrass core will use the role to access AWS cloud services. The role's permissions should allow Greengrass core Lambda functions to perform actions against the cloud.
AssociateRoleToGroup.description: Associates a role with a group. Your Greengrass core will use the role to access AWS cloud services. The role's permissions should allow Greengrass core Lambda functions to perform actions against the cloud.

ListGroupVersions.title: Lists the versions of a group.
ListGroupVersions.description: Lists the versions of a group.

CreateGroupVersion.title: Creates a version of a group which has already been defined.
CreateGroupVersion.description: Creates a version of a group which has already been defined.

GetGroupVersion.title: Retrieves information about a group version.
GetGroupVersion.description: Retrieves information about a group version.

DisassociateServiceRoleFromAccount.title: Disassociates the service role from your account. Without a service role, deployments will not work.
DisassociateServiceRoleFromAccount.description: Disassociates the service role from your account. Without a service role, deployments will not work.

GetServiceRoleForAccount.title: Retrieves the service role that is attached to your account.
GetServiceRoleForAccount.description: Retrieves the service role that is attached to your account.

AssociateServiceRoleToAccount.title: Associates a role with your account. AWS IoT Greengrass will use the role to access your Lambda functions and AWS IoT resources. This is necessary for deployments to succeed. The role must have at least minimum permissions in the policy ''AWSGreengrassResourceAccessRolePolicy''.
AssociateServiceRoleToAccount.description: Associates a role with your account. AWS IoT Greengrass will use the role to access your Lambda functions and AWS IoT resources. This is necessary for deployments to succeed. The role must have at least minimum permissions in the policy ''AWSGreengrassResourceAccessRolePolicy''.

GetConnectivityInfo.title: Retrieves the connectivity information for a core.
GetConnectivityInfo.description: Retrieves the connectivity information for a core.

UpdateConnectivityInfo.title: Updates the connectivity information for the core. Any devices that belong to the group which has this core will receive this information in order to find the location of the core and connect to it.
UpdateConnectivityInfo.description: Updates the connectivity information for the core. Any devices that belong to the group which has this core will receive this information in order to find the location of the core and connect to it.

CreateSoftwareUpdateJob.title: Creates a software update for a core or group of cores (specified as an IoT thing group.) Use this to update the OTA Agent as well as the Greengrass core software. It makes use of the IoT Jobs feature which provides additional commands to manage a Greengrass core software update job.
CreateSoftwareUpdateJob.description: Creates a software update for a core or group of cores (specified as an IoT thing group.) Use this to update the OTA Agent as well as the Greengrass core software. It makes use of the IoT Jobs feature which provides additional commands to manage a Greengrass core software update job.
